title: Keep chat message composer fixed while scrolling message list

requirements.text: Update the chat room layout so the message composer/type bar stays visually fixed at the bottom of the viewport and does not shift or move while the user scrolls through the message timeline. Ensure only the message list scrolls, and the composer remains accessible and clickable at all times (including on small/mobile screens).

quotes: try to make sure the type bar never moves despite scrolling through the messages

acceptanceCriteria: When scrolling up and down through the message list in a room, the composer/type bar stays in a fixed position at the bottom of the screen and does not move with the message content.

The message list remains scrollable independently of the composer, and messages are not hidden behind the composer (i.e., there is sufficient bottom spacing/padding so the last message can be fully viewed above the composer).
On small/mobile viewports, the composer remains usable and does not jump around during typical interactions (scrolling the timeline, focusing the input, sending a message).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn UI components are immutable); compose them from feature/page components instead.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Adding new chat features (e.g., real-time sockets, new message types).
